name: VIISA
description:
Founded in 2016 by Dragon Capital Group and FPT Corporation, Vietnam Innovative Startups Accelerator (VIISA) is a business acceleration program and a seed-stage investment holding that invests to build global-ready startups in Vietnam.

With a fast-growing middle class, increasing digital penetration, deep technological talent pool in Vietnam, we believe entrepreneurs can take advantage of these opportunities and change the world starting from Vietnam.
